name: Basketball Championship - Game
description:
Dribble, shoot, score and win in this fun basketball game great for passing time.

Level up your skills, start by competing in local and regional championships and qualify for the national games!
Earn fame, trophies and the admiration of thousands of spectators.
Challenge your friends to a 1vs1 game and see who has the best skills.

[How To Play]
- Start by choosing which mode to play in.
- Select the competition type.
- For free throw games shoot the ball at the basket at any time. But remember to dribble the ball.
- For aimed games you will need exceptional perception, coordination, timing and aiming skills to successfully score.

[Features]
- Single player mode.
- Multi player mode.
- Can play the game without internet.
- offline mode.
- A wide selection of ball skins with special effects.
- Ball upgrades.
- Court upgrades.
- Challenging game modes.
- Free throw mode.
- Aiming shoots mode.
